items.sentence: All the girls were dancing, but none of the boys were.
I began learning French when I was thirteen years old.
Can you think of any reason that we shouldn't do that?
Tom has moved to Boston to live with his grandparents.
I want Tom to go to the supermarket and buy some milk.
You don't think Tom really could've done that, do you?
I was thrown out of the house with everything I owned.
In my opinion, staying up late is bad for your health.
I caught sight of the boy escaping from the classroom.
How did you know Tom was planning on moving to Boston?
